A Clean, Well-Lighted Place

Jan 26, 2003

This article explains where the Wortheim Study (the place where I work on my dissertation) is on the pecking order of rooms for writers at the NY Public library.

“Although many New Yorkers are vaguely aware that the library sets room aside for writers, fewer know that there is a hierarchy when it comes to the level of amenities available, ranging from modest to opulent.”

NY Times
